“Just now, reverend Sir, you came to our house in this very village
for alms.
Then I gave you a piece of broken rice cake,
with a contented mind, with incomparable joy.
Afterwards my mother-in-law scolded me,
‘Where is the broken rice cake, daughter-in-law?’
